title: Four weeks, two races, lots of wrist braces: Can Tadej Poga훾ar hit top form for Tour de France?
content:
'Maybe the wrist won't be 100 percent, but the legs can be': Poga훾ar choses training over stage racing ahead of yellow jersey bout with Vingegaard.

Read the full article at Four weeks, two races, lots of wrist braces: Can Tadej Poga훾ar hit top form for Tour de France? on Velo.
